acceptance_criteria: All API functions correctly call endpoints, throw on HTTP errors, return typed responses
closed_reason: Created src/api/ticks.ts with typed fetch helpers. Includes ApiError class for HTTP failures, response types matching server.go (ListTicksResponse, GetTickResponse, etc.), and functions: fetchTicks, fetchTick, updateTick, createTick, closeTick, addNote, approveTick, rejectTick, reopenTick, fetchInfo. fetchTicks maps isBlocked->is_blocked to match BoardTick interface.
description:
Create src/api/ticks.ts with typed fetch functions:

export async function fetchTicks(): Promise<Tick[]>
export async function fetchTick(id: string): Promise<Tick>
export async function updateTick(id: string, updates: Partial<Tick>): Promise<Tick>
export async function createTick(tick: NewTick): Promise<Tick>
export async function closeTick(id: string, reason: string): Promise<Tick>
export async function addNote(id: string, note: string): Promise<void>

Error handling:
- Throw typed errors for HTTP failures
- Parse JSON responses with type assertions

Test: Mock fetch, verify correct URL construction and error handling
title: Create typed API fetch helpers
